bug.author: rokm
bug.summary: [highgui]: Qt-based windows do not display mouse pointer coordinates and pixel values anymore
bug.description: Since <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/commit/46bfdbaf82f783b36a0462f7e71e261ccbf60da2>46bfdba</denchmark-link> , the Qt-based windows do not display the mouse pointer coordinates nor the RGB/intensity values under the mouse pointer. And the mouse event callback now returns the coordinates that appear to be relative to the window origin instead of image origin (i.e., when the display is zoomed in and displays only a portion of the image).
